title: Lesson Plan - The Story of the Third Wave
description:
Lesson Plan: The Story of the Third Wave 

Directed by: Philip Neel, David H. Jeffery
Runtime: 1 hour 16 minutes

In 1967, history teacher Ron Jones conducted a social experiment meant to teach his students a lesson about fascism, but in a matter of days it had spiraled out of control. In this documentary, former students re-tell the story of what really happened.
